content:
The number of hours since sunrise and the water level at the coast of Tasmania (in meters above sea level) was measured for several days.
  
**Plot the data in a scatter plot.**  


  
|||||||
:-- | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | 
**Day** | $1$ | $2$ | $3$ | $4$ | $5$ | $6$ 
**Hours** | $3$ | $2$ | $1$ | $0$ | $2.5$ | $3.5$ 
**Height (meters)** | $-0.4$ | $0.1$ | $0.2$ | $0.5$ | $-0.3$ | $-0.5$
